title: "Introducción a R"
format: html
---

```{=html}
<iframe id="pdf-frame" src="IntroR.pdf" style="width:100%" frameborder="0"></iframe>

<script>
  function adjustPDFSize() {
    var iframe = document.getElementById('pdf-frame');
    var width = iframe.clientWidth;
    iframe.style.height = (width * (3/4))+ 45 + "px"; // Height = 3 X × Width
  }

  window.onload = adjustPDFSize;
  window.onresize = adjustPDFSize;
</script>
```
